name: The Juggernaut Quiz | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Berkeley, California.

	Marko is the stepbrother of Charles Xavier, founder of the X-Men. His father, Kurt, was physically abusive toward young Cain.

questions.text: Marko found the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak during which war?
questions.explanation:
Korean War.

	Marko originally found the gem in a long-lost cave during the Korean War. Having been sent to military school, Cain served in the Army alongside his stepbrother.

questions.text: With which other villain did Marko try to share his power?
questions.explanation:
"Black" Tom Cassidy.

	Juggernaut and "Black" Tom Cassidy were often a team, pairing up to fight the X-Men again and again. They eventually parted ways when the Juggernaut decided to go straight.

questions.text: While living with the X-Men, Marko befriended Sammy Pare.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Sammy was a Canadian boy who also had an abusive father, and was later killed by "Black" Tom Cassidy when he went insane partly due to his secondary mutation.

questions.text: Juggernaut was sucked into a black hole by the second Xorn. Where did he end up?
questions.explanation:
Mojoworld.

	Mojoworld is ruled by the insane and despotic ruler Mojo. Juggernaut became Mojo's property, but managed to escape to the Danger Room with the help of Nocturne.

questions.text: In "New Excalibur #15", who allows Juggernaut to stay on the team?
questions.explanation:
Pete Wisdom.

	After returning to South Korea to cope with his waning powers, Marko was forced to face the atrocities he had taken part in before his reformation. Ashamed, he wondered if he should leave the team, but Wisdom convinced him otherwise.

questions.text: Cain Marko was Cyttorak's first choice to be the Juggernaut.
questions.explanation:
False.

	It was actually Charles Xavier, however, Marko was nonetheless good at what he did, his anger and hatred fueling his strength even further beyond Cyttorak's enhancement.

questions.text: Which other team member of New Excalibur has shown an attraction to Juggernaut?
questions.explanation:
Nocturne.

	Although there is a mutual attraction between the two, Marko kept questioning whether it was the right time to pursue a relationship.

questions.text: In the Age of Apocalypse, where does Cain reside?
questions.explanation:
Avalon.

	Cain became a pacifist monk in this reality, and when confronted with a seemingly inevitable battle, died of a brain aneurysm because his dedication to peace was that great.

questions.text: In the Ultimate universe, whom does Juggernaut have a crush on?
questions.explanation:
Rogue.

	Rogue's powers in this universe are similar to those of the Rogue from normal continuity. The Ultimate Juggernaut, however, is different from his normal counterpart because he was part of the Weapon X program, whereas normal Juggernaut was not.
